name: FCPXSequence
desc: An object that contains details of a sequence that's open in the Final Cut Pro timeline.

items.name: var duration: CMTime
items.desc: The duration of a sequence opened in the Final Cut Pro timeline.

items.name: var frameDuration: CMTime
items.desc: The amount of time to play a frame in a sequence.

items.name: var startTime: CMTime
items.desc: The start time of a sequence opened in the Final Cut Pro timeline.

items.name: var timecodeFormat: FCPXSequenceTimecodeFormat
items.desc: The timecode format of the frames in a sequence.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The name of the active sequence in the Final Cut Pro timeline.
